span.strong: Mississinawa Valley Schools is CLOSED through the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. We will continue to educate the children of our community through this extended closure with our last day of online learning likely to be May 29th.
The Alumni Banquet for this year has been canceled.
Dates for rescheduled events will be announced as they are determined.
